content: Is there a word for the opposite of inspiring? That’s what this article is. I mean, why even bother with artists at all if it’s so meaningless? Why not just take the photo through a photoshop filter and print it on canvas? Also, he points out how useful it is to exploit global inequality to get cheap labour abroad like he’s doing them a favour but in the same breath would just replace as much of that labour with robots if he could. Ultimately it’s just about increasing his own wealth in any way he can. Sorry but there are things more valuable than riches.
